item.description:
Hi folks!

The weather has been so good to us this fall! The temperature might drop in the next few weeks, but if you're willing to bring a couple of layers, let's go another round of walking and talking and breathing delicious fall air at West Rock! Put on a pair of gloves, and join us for a Sunday afternoon walk, before the Holidays start to take over!

LOCATION: This Meetup will take place at West Rock, which is a Connecticut State Park located in New Haven and Hamden. There are various entrances to the park, but we will be parking at Lake Wintergreen.

PLAN: West Rock offers various levels of hiking, as it is a very large park. However, this Meetup will be manageable for any hiker. We will walk through the woods on level ground, and avoid rocky or steep terrain.

WHEN AND WHERE: Meet at the Lake Wintergreen entrance, which is located on Main Street, between 12:45 and 1:00, and we'll try to get rolling onto the trail by 1:15. This hike will take 2 hours. We will walk around the lake, because it is pretty, and the view of the water will fill the void where the foliage is dropping off.

BRING: A bottle of WATER! (And a snack if you like.)

WEAR: Sneakers will suffice for this one. LAYERS. A hat.

COST: We ask for a donation of one dollar, towards the monthly fee that is charged by the Meetup Website. Please bring any contributions with you on the day of the hike.

DIRECTIONS: Directions will be emailed to all who RSVP.

PARKING NOTE: There is no fee for parking in the lot.

Park website
Google Map - Approximate Location of Park Entrance
item.how_to_find_us: Organizer (Sarah) will be wearing a red fleece and a winter hat.

group.name: New Haven Walks in the Woods

item.name: New Haven Hikers' Low-pressure Sunday Afternoon Walk
